extendedInfo.description: Give a patriotic look to your Android screen by waving your National Flag at your screen for FREE. 3D National Flag live wallpaper is a beautiful 3D rotating wallpaper looks like your Nation's flag is blowing in the wind!!The flag waves and wiggles smoothly just as flapping in the wind. There are plenty of flags of various countries are available from which you can chose your favorite one like Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, India, Japan, Mexico, Russia, South- Korea, Spain, UK, US and many more.Features:===============1. Select your Nation's Flag from the list.2. 3 beautiful set of background themes.2. Real OpenGL 3D animation!4. Optimize for both tablet and phone, portrait and landscape mode! Shining color and stunning styles.5. Set as live wallpaper or run as standalone app!6. Totally Free !!7. Live wallpaper gives stunning look as all designs are in HD quality.8. It's performance is heavily optimized as it is created using textures in OpenGL with good memory handling. Won't slow your phone down at all.9. Set as live wallpaper and feel proud for your Nation !Celebrate your countries special day like Independence Day, Memorial Day, Veterans day, Republic Day with the flying flag at your home screen. You can even have it for celebrating your country winning in any big event like sports and Olympic! Beautiful live wallpaper with amazing blend of colours like red, blue, green, white, black etc. Motive of this wallpaper is to spread peace and harmony as knowledge of other nations and cultures will help lead to further peace and brotherhood and exploring other country national flags and anthems is a good beginning. A great live wallpaper for all Nation lovers !!Wave your Nation Flag with pride and show your patriotism with this amazing 3D National Flag live Wallpaper! Tags: Live wallpaper, National Flag, Android free live wallpaper, Android free app, free wallpaper

reviews.title: exquisite and patriotic
reviews.comment: it is beautiful. we can choose our country flag and even background and flag will smoothly wave on your screen which looks really wonderful
